TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentDesignerDebugService

Docs.summary: Provides debugging services in a design-time environment.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Assert (bool condition, string message);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Assert(bool condition, string message) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` to prevent from being displayed; otherwise, `false`.
Docs.summary: Asserts on a condition inside a design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Assert method enables a designer to assert on a condition inside a design-time environment.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the indent level for debug output.
Docs.value: The indent level for debug output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IndentLevel property enables a designer to change the indent level for debug output.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of trace listeners for monitoring design-time debugging output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Listeners property enables objects to monitor design-time debugging output.
